info.name: Moving Walls 3D
info.attribution:
The game layout and the treasure card template were created by ArnoldSmith86 and https://www.reddit.com/user/Casbuild and are released to the public domain by CC0. Treasure images (all Public Domain): https://freesvg.org/boomerang-vector-image https://freesvg.org/johnny-automatic-crown https://freesvg.org/brown-hat https://freesvg.org/old-map-scroll https://freesvg.org/vector-clip-art-of-break-glass-with-fire-axe https://freesvg.org/cutlass-cartoon-image https://freesvg.org/colorful-cube https://freesvg.org/machovka-hot-dog https://freesvg.org/10-o-clock https://freesvg.org/venetian-mask-vector-image https://freesvg.org/vector-drawing-of-toaster https://freesvg.org/vector-image-of-wooden-treasure-chest-with-gold-frame https://freesvg.org/1379546138 Dice images (all CC-BY 3.0 by Delapouite): https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/dice-six-faces-one.html https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/dice-six-faces-two.html https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/dice-six-faces-three.html https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/dice-six-faces-four.html https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/dice-six-faces-five.html Tower images (all Public Domain): https://freesvg.org/round-tower-map-vector-symbol https://freesvg.org/map-symbols-of-tower-square https://freesvg.org/aiga-stairs-up-sign-vector-image https://freesvg.org/aiga-stairs-down-sign-vector-image Labyrinth tiles: https://ambientcg.com/view?id=Ground042 (CC0) https://opengameart.org/content/seamless-concrete-floor-tile by Kris Occhipinti (CC-BY-SA 4.0) Background: https://purepng.com/photo/2804/objects-scroll (CC0) https://www.pexels.com/photo/brown-wooden-parquet-floor-172291/ (Pexels License)

Library image generated using the Midjourney artificial intelligence image generator, https://www.midjourney.com/home/, using the following prompt: "dungeon walls watercolor painting --ar 1:1 --v 5.1"
info.description: Shift tiles on 3D board to complete a pattern to collect treasure and block opponents. First to collect treasure pieces wins.

Reset1.css: background:#4c4c4c; border:10%; border-color: black; font-size: 100%; color:black;
